title: Broken Fate
description: One glance at sweet, gorgeous Lena has my fists clenched and my wolf snarling… she’s mine, even if she bears the enemy’s claiming mark.Full blurb reveal to come… The To Be Claimed Saga continues with Jude’s story.This standalone novel contains a growly alpha werewolf that’s just as hot as he is protective. Guaranteed happily ever after.
author: Willow Winters
